entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:58 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near Fernie. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
